data.title: *** Visit To Bulgaria ***
data.meta_description: Most important phone numbers Related: Postal (ZIP) Codes | Cities population | Cities and regions|0123 - operator for international calls (if no direct phone call is possible) 1286, 983 308 - Road Ass
data.text:
Page update: 01 January 2000 Most important phone numbers

Related: Postal (ZIP) Codes | Cities population | Cities and regions|

0123 - operator for international calls (if no direct phone call is possible)

1286, 983 308 - Road Assistance

75 361 - Institute for Treatment of Foreign Citizens

798 035 - Sofia Airport - International Flights

722 414 - Sofia Airport - Domestic Flights

121 - operator for long-distance calls within the country

140 - sending of telegrams

144 - telephone information service for office phone numbers

145 - telephone information service for home numbers

146 - Emergency Road Service

150 - Emergency Medical Aid

166 - Police/Road patrols

175 - weather forecast

180 - exact time ("speaking" clock)

Dialing Mobile phone numbers in Bulgaria

Mobile Operator

Codes for dialing

MTel (GSM 900/1800)

+359 886 XXX XXX

+359 887 XXX XXX

+359 888 XXX XXX

+359 889 XXX XXX

GloBul (GSM 900/1800)

+359 896 XXX XXX

+359 897 XXX XXX

+359 898 XXX XXX

+359 899 XXX XXX

Mobikom (NMT-450)

+359 48 XXX XXX

Telephone code for Bulgaria: 359

BTC Phone codes of some of Bulgarian cities and villages:

If you are dialing some number from Bulgaria don't forget to put (0) before dialing code
